LanguageData.RoyalBastard64.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of a lord and a prostitute.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] father's line was secure and his holdings strong. Nobody ever came to [PAWN_nameDef] to endorse a bid for the title. [PAWN_pronoun] earned [PAWN_possessive] bread cleaning the brothel, but always felt [PAWN_pronoun] deserved much more.
LanguageData.RoyalBastard64.title: royal bastard
LanguageData.ServingBoy97.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was the child of house servants, and was trained to carry on the family duty.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] carried things and polished silverware, but was never allowed into the lords' part of the house.
LanguageData.ServingBoy97.title: serving boy
LanguageData.WarBastard60.description: [PAWN_nameDef] was born nine months after [PAWN_possessive] mother's town was conquered by enemy soldiers. The child of violence with no acknowledged father, [PAWN_nameDef] grew up at the bottom of the social pyramid.\n\n[PAWN_possessive] mother instilled her bitterness towards men and war into [PAWN_nameDef]. [PAWN_possessive] pet rabbit offered more warmth than any human in [PAWN_possessive] life.
LanguageData.WarBastard60.title: war bastard
